sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSRENTREG where ACCDATE = :accdate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno

insert into LNSRENTREG (ACCDATE, SERSEQNO, TRANDATE, SERIALNO, ACCTNO, REQMAP, RSQMAP, TIMESTAMP, BRC) values (:accdate, :serseqno, :trandate, :serialno, :acctno, :reqmap, :rsqmap, current timestamp, :brc)

update LNSRENTREG set TRANDATE = :trandate, SERIALNO = :serialno, ACCTNO = :acctno, REQMAP = :reqmap, RSQMAP = :rsqmap, TIMESTAMP = current timestamp, BRC = :brc where ACCDATE = :accdate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno
select ACCDATE, SERSEQNO, TRANDATE, SERIALNO, ACCTNO, REQMAP, RSQMAP, TIMESTAMP, BRC from LNSRENTREG where ACCDATE = :accdate and SERSEQNO = :serseqno
